testimonials.name: Sarah Mitchell
testimonials.quote: Junaid transformed our legacy dashboard into a blazing-fast React application. The performance improvements were remarkable â€” our users noticed immediately. His architectural guidance helped us scale confidently.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.quote: Working with Junaid was a game-changer. He didn't just write code; he taught our team best practices and established patterns we still use today. The real estate search UI he built handles millions of listings effortlessly.

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.quote: Our design system went from a collection of inconsistent components to a well-documented, type-safe library that all our teams love using. Junaid's attention to developer experience made all the difference.
